topic_text: Planning to attend a music festival
passage: I'm going to go to a music festival in September. It will take place from 15th September to 25th September in Berlin, Germany. Tickets cost about 45 euro. I'm going to stay for a few days in a hotel and for two or three days with my friends. In September is usually warm, but perhaps it will be rain. So I'll need to take an umbrella and a raincoat with me. I'll pack a pair of jeans, a few t-shirts and a pullover as well. There are stages with different kinds of music. So I can listen to music that I like.

topic_text: Giving instructions to play a game
passage: Find an area of about 8x3 meters. After, find ten plastic bottles and fill them with water to make them heavier. Then, put bottles in four rows of 4, then 3, then 2, then 1. Each player take a shoot with frisbee. Player gets the amount of points equal to number of bottles he knocked down. If he knocked out all of the bottles, then he takes two more shots and all the points are added together. Wins the player with the most points. It's not recommended to play on a very windy day!
query_sentence: Wins the player with the most points .

passage: Is gender difference in Ukraine has same popularity in discussions as in the other countries like UK, US etc. ? I would say yes and no. Yes, because we do have gender inequality. However, time have been changed a lot and now women almost equal men and they are actually doing same things as most of men. As for me, great difference in my country is that entrepreneur prefer to hire or promote women for a top position, as a GM or even CEO than a men. Because there is a tendency to consider that women are more responsible, creative, friendly etc. than men. On the other hand there are also some facts about woman why they can not be hired for top positions.
